name: VES - PA Luxury Hotel
address: 9A Nguyễn Thị Nghĩa, phường 2, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Đà Lạt, cách Sân golf Dalat Palace Golf Club 15 phút đi bộ và Vườn hoa Đà Lạt 1.9 km, VES - PA Luxury Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có sân hiên và chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phícho khách lái xe. Khách sạn 2 sao này có dịch vụ phòng và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ. Một số phòng tại chỗ nghỉ có ban công với view núi.

Tất cả các căn tại khách sạn đi kèm TV màn hình phẳng và két an toàn. Ngoài phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, các phòng tại VES - PA Luxury Hotel đều có view thành phố. Tại chỗ nghỉ, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Leo núi là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, VES - PA Luxury Hotel có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Khách sạn cách Quảng trường Lâm Viên 2.5 km và Hồ Xuân Hương 2.7 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Liên Khương, cách VES - PA Luxury Hotel 29 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ này cũng cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.comment_positive: everything was clean and nice. One of the best value hotels we’ve stayed at on our 1 month trip!! would highly recommend. we rented a very nice bike for a reasonable price and the staff was incredibly helpful!!

Rooms were very clean and the showers were nice and hot. The owners don’t speak english but communicated through translate, they were super friendly and couldn’t do enough for you. Motorcycle hire is available at a good price and they can sort onwards travel for you if you require. Can’t fault this Hotel!

주인의 한국어실력이 수준급이라 편하게 여행을 마무리 할수 있었구요.
숙소에 바이크가 많이 구비되어 있어서 운전만 할수 있는 조건이라면  적은비용으로도 충분히 달랏여행을 할수 있었습니다.
한국식당도 두곳이나 있는 점도 가선점을 주고 싶네요..
숙소가 큰도로변이 아니구 그렇다고 한참을 안쪽으로 들어가는 곳이 아니며 주변이 대학교와 공원내 실내체육관이 있어서 조용한 숙소와 언어의 문제점을 극복하기엔 좋은 숙소라 생각됩니다.
한국여행자분들의 방문을 많이 기대하는 숙소인듯합니다

Sạch sẽ. Sảnh lễ tân có mùi thơm dễ chịu.
Phòng vệ sinh khô ráo. Nước nóng hoạt động tốt. Ông chủ có phong thái chuyên nghiệp.
review.comment_negative:

- Phòng ban công tầng 1 thấp, trong khi các nhà đối diện luôn có người nhòm qua. Nên không dám mở cửa ban công. (Không nên book ban công tầng 1)
- Mùi tinh dầu xả hơi nồng và cheap. Nên thay bằng sáp thơm.
- Ks 2 sao nhưng không có dầu gội.
- Thảm lau chân không thấp nước, có như không có.

- Địa chỉ trên booking bị sai, Hotel nằm trong hẻm

review.rating: Nous avions des attentes élevées, mais avons été déçus.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
-Le personnel est accueillant et attentionné. 
-La location de motocyclette (rapide, efficace, pas trop dispendieux et très bonne motocyclette).
review.comment_negative:
-Premièrement, nous n'avons pas eu la chambre que nous avions réservée (avec un balcon). Lors du checkout, le propriétaire a quand même essayé de nous faire payer cette chambre, même si nous avons eu une chambre standard (donc moins dispendieuse).
-La chambre était très petite et il y avait beaucoup de fourmis sur le plancher. Nous en avons même retrouvées sur le lit. 
-La douche n'était pas assez chaude et n'avait pas de pression.
-Le propriétaire est sympathique, mais il s'est montré intrusif à quelques reprises et cela ne nous a pas plu. Il était un peu trop tactile. À notre arrivée, il m'a pris par la taille pour je ne sais trop quelle raison. Il me touchait les bras et les mains à chaque fois que nous discutions avec lui. 

Nous avions réservé pour deux nuits, mais tout cela nous a poussé à quitter l'hôtel et à en réserver un autre après la première nuit.

review.comment_positive: If you’re debating which hotel to stay in Da Lat please look no further as you’ll find nothing better than this place. Hien was incredibly welcoming from the moment we arrived. Although he doesn’t speak English nor we speak Vietnamese, he was still keen to speak to us through translate to ensure we had the most amazing stay! He organised motorbike hire for us and even came with us to the petrol station as he wasn’t sure whether we knew how to fill them up. On the night we arrived we were in desperate need of our laundry washing and it was given back to us on the same night which we were very grateful for. Our room was spotless and clean and was kept up with daily cleaning. The bed was so comfortable and we were extremely pleased that the TV had Netflix on especially for the day we got caught in a thunderstorm and spent a few hours hiding from the storm. The location of the hotel is perfect, situated only a short walk away from the night market. It is also far enough to not be bothered by the noise from outside. We loved Ves - Pa hotel and would recommend to anyone staying in the area. Thank you Hien for your kindness, we hope to stay again!

review.comment_positive: 저는 한국인입니다. 호텔 사장님이 한국어를 조금 할 줄 알아서 이야기 나누기 편했고, 다른 직원들도 모두 진짜 친절했습니다. 저는 냐짱 가는 슬리핑버스를 한국에서 예약하고 왔지만 아직 예약 안 한 손님들의 예약을 다 도와 주시는 것 같았어요. 요즘 한국에서 이슈가 되고 있는 빈대때문에 걱정을 좀 했는데 빈대 뿐만 아니라 벌레걱정 1도 없었습니다. 깨끗하고 친절하고 조용하고 침대 편안하고 주변 맛집 많고.. 더 이상 무얼 더 바랄까요?

review.comment_positive: Đầy là lần thứ 3 đặt ks VES-PA. Chú và Cô cực thân thiện và dễ mến, dễ gần, nếu bạn chưa biết đi đâu hay phân vân giữa các điểm đến thì chú có thể là một hướng dẫn viên tuyệt vời. Phòng sạch sẽ, chăn ấm nệm êm và được dọn thường xuyên, mỗi khi đi chơi về là phòng đã được dọn ngăn nắp. Nhà vệ sinh sẽ là một ấn tượng lớn, khá rộng và luôn khô ráo khi bạn trở về. Bạn nên đặt ks của Cô và Chú khi đến Đà Lạt du lịch.

Phòng rộng rãi, thoáng mát, có ban công rất chill và phòng đầy đủ các tiện nghi. Phòng vệ sinh rất sạch sẽ có hệ thống nước nóng lạnh rất tốt. Mình đi chơi đêm về muộn vẫn có cô nhân viên rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ mình ra vào hotel. Khách sạn có vị trí gần trung tâm đà lạt nên di chuyển rất thuận lợi nha. review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Мы были очень приятно удивлены проживанием в этом отеле. Владелец и его жена очень приятные и доброжелательные люди, мы очень рады знакомству. В отеле очень чисто, уборку номеров делали каждый день со сменой постельного белья и полотенец, так же есть гигиенические принадлежности. Сам отель выглядит красиво, есть роскошный лифт)) В номере довольно тихо, тепло и всё есть для комфортной жизни, в том числе холодильник. Вай фай работает хорошо. В отеле мы смогли арендовать  байк по хорошей цене. По любому вопросы мы обращались к владельцу и нам сразу помогали.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
I recently stayed at the Khách sạn Vespa for 8 nights and I have to say, it was a wonderful experience. This family-owned hotel is the perfect budget-friendly option for families and couples looking to explore Dalat. The location is excellent, with the city center and all amenities just a stone's throw away.
The hosts were incredibly friendly and accommodating, making my stay all the more enjoyable. They even rent motorcycles that’s why the name Vespa .
The hotel itself was clean and comfortable, with all the amenities we needed for a comfortable stay. The rooms were spacious and well-appointed, with comfortable beds and plenty of storage space.
Overall, I would highly recommend the Khách sạn Vespa to anyone looking for a great place to stay in Dalat. With its excellent location, friendly hosts, and comfortable rooms, it's truly one of the best options in the area

We were able to take out mopeds for 150,000 dong and the receptionists helped us drive them. The location was great and near the centre. The uncle at the hotel ( I think he was called hien) was so friendly and arranged transportation for us.

review.rating: Very clean, very friendly, chilled vibe in great area - we recommend you stay here!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Put simply: stay here! Our room was really clean and spacious, with a balcony overlooking the rooftops of Da Lat. Nice big bed and a TV with Netflix. The owner doesn’t speak English but him and his wife are extremely friendly and enthusiastic and we easily communicated with them using Google Translate - and they made us feel very at home! The owner also stored our luggage for us when we left and got us a super cheap taxi to the airport which saved us a fairly substantial amount of money. They also rent out motorbikes (hence the name of the hotel!) 

It’s in a nice quiet backstreet but really close to lots of restaurants and bars and coffee shops, and the lakeside is a short walk (or v short taxi ride) away. 10/10 would stay there again if we ever come back to Da Lat.

The people are very kind and accommodating! Very nice. We arrived early in the morning (6am) and were able to check in to another room for a small fee so we could sleep. All very kind. Our room was on the four to floor and was surrounded by windows, giving amazing views of beautiful Da Lat! The fan was able to keep it cool enough. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. Fresh towels and bed made everyday! Water pressure good. Hosts do not speak much English but was not a problem thanks to Google translate, they were very nice.
review.comment_negative: Would have been extra nice to have drinking water available (instead of bottled water for a fee). Also was quite noisy until about 1am on a couple of nights due to dogs barking very loudly - probably louder for us due to the room we were in were all windows, so sound insulation maybe not as good as other rooms. Some ants in the room but nothing to worry about.

Chỗ nghỉ quá tuyệt vời, gần các địa điểm ăn uống nổi tiếng. 
Bác chủ thân thiện, vui vẻ, nhiệt tình quá luôn ấy.

review.comment_positive: It was super clean with cleaning service every morning. The host was very nice and he even saved us money on our trip to Ho Chi Minh by arranging a pick-up service and a very comfortable bus. Location was also good and the vespas to rent were the newest we had thus far in Vietnam. Bed was comfortable and shower always had hot water.

Ngoài ra xung quanh ks có rất nhiều hàng ăn đậm nét Đàlat như  bánh căn, bánh tráng nướng sữa đậu nành siêu ngon, ko cần phải đi tìm đâu xa vẫn đc ăn ngon. Nhất định lần sau sẽ ghé nữa...nữa....

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tôi là 1 người cực kì khó tính nhưng với  chuyến du lịch 4 ngày 3 đêm vừa qua, tôi hết sức hài lòng về Vespa Luxury Hotel. Ần tượng đầu tiên là vợ chồng  anh chủ, lịch sự, cởi mở, quan tâm chăm sóc khách hàng rất tốt. Kế đến , khi bước vô phòng có mùi hương thoang thoảng thật dễ chịu, phòng sạch sẽ, vật dụng trong phòng mới, sạch. Toilet thì quá sạch, đây là cái quan trọng nhất khi thuê ks hay nhà nghỉ đối với tôi. Mỗi ngày, có chị nhân viên vô dọn dẹp phòng, chị thật thà, vui vẻ, làm việc rất có tâm. Nhờ vậy, mà chuyến du lịch lần này của vợ chồng tôi được vui vẻ trọn vẹn. Lần sau, có dịp đi ĐL, nhất định tôi sẽ đặt phòng ở đây. Tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè biết nơi này. ❤️❤️❤️

Great hotel with everything you need! This nice  hotel is located in a quiet street close to the city center and can be reached quickly on foot. The staff are super friendly and helpful. The owner doesn't speak English, but has the translator app right there, so it works great. The rooms are very clean, there are towels, soap and shampoo. You can book tours through the hotel and rent motorcycles for 150,000 dong a day.
We had a great stay and can highly recommend it.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We were grateful for Mr. Hien's intensive support.
review.comment_negative: There were some noise from street wendors from down stairs started by 6:30am.  But it is difficult to find a completely quite place to stay in Vienam.  We checked in around 8:30 pm.  Mr. Hien asked us if we wanted to have dinner then he personally walked us to a near by restaurant .We rented a motorbike from the hotel to go out the next day.  He took my husband to fill up the gas tank in the motorbike.  We were lost on the way back.  Two minutes after we called he came by on his motorbike to lead us back to the hotel.  The day before we  checked out, he ordered a limousine van for us for the next day.  As we had to leave at 9am for a 4 hours ride he would buy us some food to go from the wendors for us earlier in that morning.  Thanks again Mr. Hien for taking such good care of us.

review.rating: Super helpful and friendly staff - An affordable gem in Da Lat!
review.comment_positive: The hospitality and friendliness of the owners was remarkable. They really made sure we had everything we needed, and proposed various services during our trip, such as renting a motor bike and fixing a taxi to the airport.  From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with a smile and the owner made sure to tell us about the hotel and show us around our rooms. It was clear that he knows how to make sure we were comfortable! The rooms were spacious and clean, the pictures definitely match the reality, which we have noticed was not always the case during our trip in Vietnam. At Vespa hotel, everything was perfect and the owners were just so friendly. Definitely a highlight of our trip and an affordable gem.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We are so glad with this accommodation choice! We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights, got the possibility to do an early check-in and rent a scooter for 2 days at a very good price; the owner was very attentive and received us with a warm welcome. The room was big and very well cleaned (and completely cleaned again on the second day). The cost-benefit is incredibly good.
Recommend it 100%!

마지막 체크아웃때 제가 미리 버스 회사에 예약한 다낭가는 슬리핑버스 픽업 때문에 문제가 있었는데 사장님께서 도와 주셔서 문제가 해결되었습니다.
사장님이 챙겨주신 망고 젤리와 생수 그리고 과일 정말 맛있게 먹었습니다.
젊은시절 달랏에 방문하고 20년만에 방문 하여서 많은것이 새롭게 바뀌었지만 달랏에 인정은 그대로 인거 같습니다.
호텔 적극 추천해드리고 주변에 한국식당도 많고 바로 100m에 시장도 있습니다

I really appreciate this hotel, both for the convenience, facility and the hospitality.  I came in the early morning and uncle Hien (the owner of the hotel) was really supportive to help us for an early check-in. The room was very clean & comfortable with a nice TV including Netflix & Youtube, our room was cleaned up by the staff everyday so it was always clean when we came back after hanging out 😊 The room was cozy & had no insects, which I liked the most 😊 The hotel is quite near the centre of Da Lat, so it was quite convenient for us as we rented a nice scooter of the hotel and traveled around the city. There were so many things that I liked about this place, so if you want to make your travel much more enjoyable, I think this hotel is an ideal place 🥰

Een voorbeeld is: wij hadden sinaasappels op de kamer gelegd en bij de schoonmaakbeurt van de kamer, zetten zij daar een bord met een mes bij, handig. Zij hadden in de gaten dat wij thee op de kamer dronken, zij plaatsten de eerstvolgende keer extra theeglazen en legden er theezakjes bij. Zo waren er meer voorbeelden.   Samengevat een heerlijke accomodatie met een heerlijk bed en goede douche en zeer klantgerichte eigenaren.

review.comment_positive: I don't even know where to start with this place. Maybe the owner: he doesn't speak any English, but with Google translate he could still help me with so much. He even spent half an hour helping me to rent a bike, driving me to the bike place with his scooter and making sure everything was OK. Him and his wife were so friendly, they made me feel right at home. Then the area of the hotel: it's central but quiet, full of cute little cafes and shops and still with an authentic local feel to it. The room was sparkling clean (sheets smelled yummy), had a fantastic view and a spacious bathroom. For all this, the price is really fair. I can warmly recommend this place to all travelers!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We stayed in 2 rooms over 4 nights - one room was a 10star  other was an 8.

The hotel and owners are very friendly and helpful although no English, the hotel is very clean and the rooms were cleaned daily. The bed was one of the comfiest I have stayed in whilst travelling for one month in Asia and the bedding is very comfortable. The shower was also one of the best we have had while travelling. There is also lots of storage space which is helpful. 

The location is good, around 15mins walk to center and there is lots of food nearby. 

I would recommend this hotel!
review.comment_negative:
Really good stay just two things could have been improved:

The first room we stayed in (201) has two windows in it that face the corridor, the blind on the window was really useless and let in all the light from the corridor and its right above the bed, this meant the room was really bright all night if you do not have an eye mask.

On booking.com we booked a ‘double room with a balcony’, but only when they offered the room upgrade for our last two nights did we have a balcony. The second room we were in was really good, but I did not realise until now that we should have had a room with a balcony the entire time not just the last 2 days (the photos of the room i booked also show a balcony), i imagine the hotel might just need to update its booking.com listing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room and toilet were perfectly clean and suitable for our stay. The owner is really nice and helpful but can’t speak any English at all. Communication was easy enough by google translate.
review.comment_negative: Although basic communication was managed by google translate, the owner failed to let us know some important details such as that the bus he helped us book for hcmc had a transfer vehicle coming 45 mins before the bus departure time to take us to the bus station (we didn’t realize this and thought he booked the transfer directly from the hotel to hcmc so we were terribly rushed as we thought we still had enough time to pack) and that he didn’t accept card payment (so we were scrambling to pay at check out because the transfer vehicle to the bus was already waiting for us). These little things due to language barrier or insufficient communication caused our morning to start terribly as we were so rushed. However, we know the owner is a nice man and perhaps simply forgot to mention these things.

review.comment_positive: We loved this hotel, it was very clean and spacious and we were made to feel very welcome. The owner was really really friendly, arranged our onward travel to Nha Trang and also sorted motorbikes for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Everything was perfect.
We arrived at 7am from the night bus and were supposed to check in at 12, but they let us stay in another room to rest until that time.
The owner was extremely nice and helpful. He showed us around when we asked for recommendations for places to eat, helped us park our bike every time he saw us arriving, and was always welcoming us with a smile. Although he didn't speak English, he managed to be pleasant and helpful as we communicated with a translating app.
The room was beautiful, comfortable and very clean, it was as good as some rooms in 4 star-hotels.
The location is excellent, right in the center, in a dynamic yet quiet part of the city.
I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour dans cet hôtel. Les propriétaires sont très gentils et efficaces, la chambre était propre, confortable et située dans une ruelle calme proche du centre.

review.rating: Recommend nên ở đây, lan tỏa trải nghiệm tuyệt vời đến các bạn đang lăn tăn ko biết chọn KS nào
review.comment_positive:
- gần các điểm hot ở Đà Lạt: chợ Đà Lạt, quảng trường Lâm Viên,... Đi xe vài phút là đến
- xung quanh nhiều quán ăn
- chú chủ cực kì thân thiện và nhiệt tình, vui vẻ. Mình đến ks lúc 5h sáng mà chú vẫn vui vẻ đón tiếp mình. Chú hướng dẫn tất tần tật mọi thứ và tiện nghi trong phòng, chỉ chi tiết lắm. 
-Hình ảnh trên Booking giống như ở ngoài 
- ngày nào phòng cũng đc dọn dẹp sạch sẽ lắm, thơm mùi sả. Đôi khi mùi hơi nồng nhưng mở cửa sổ xíu là okela
- phòng có minibar, máy sấy, ấm điện, nước nóng. Đủ các tiện ích cần thiết trong phòng. 
- ở đây chú có cho thuê xe máy, giá cả hợp lý chứ ko đắt đâu. Xe đi okie, lên các con dốc Đà Lạt thì vô tư
- TV ở đây có Netflix nữa ạ, tv to xịn sò thêm quả Netflix cộng với lạnh lạnh của Đà Lạt thì cần gì ra rạp cũng có thể chill chill xem phim tại phòng rồi. 
- nếu có dịp quay trở lại Đà Lạt thì mình cũng sẽ chọn Vespa làm nơi dừng chân

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Чистый и уютный номер. Большая удобная кровать. Красивый балкон с видом на улицу. Отзывчивый и добрый хозяин готов ответить на всё ваши вопросы. Обязательно вернёмся снова! Рекомендуем эту гостиницу. Удобное расположение.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
- Anh chị chủ quá tuyệt vời, luôn vui vẻ, gần gũi, ân cần hỏi thăm việc ngủ nghỉ tại khách sạn, hướng dẫn việc đi lại ăn uống, anh chủ còn ra làm lơ xe giúp mình mỗi khi mình đỗ xe :)
Khi về còn hỏi có gì chưa hài lòng thì bỏ qua trong khi mình thì hài lòng về mọi thứ :))
- Mình book phòng cho gia đình phòng 02 giường đôi size Queen, mà anh chị chủ cho mình phòng tận 04 giường đôi size Queen và vẫn 
giữ nguyên mức giá như đã book, đã vậy giá phòng quá hạt dẻ luôn :)
Phòng quá rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, thơm phức và đầy đủ thiết bị, tiện nghi...vợ con mình cứ khen nức nở và ngủ ngon, muốn ngủ hoài mà không muốn dậy đi chơi :))
- Vị trí khách sạn ờ khu trung tâm nên đi lại thuận tiện, nhiều dịch vụ, nhiều nhà hàng ăn uống, nhất là ai muốn thưởng thức bánh căn nỗi tiếng nhất Đà Lạt có thể đi bộ vì chưa tới 300m :)
- Mình chắc chắn sẽ ở đây mỗi khi lên Đà Lạt, mình cũng sẽ giới thiệu người thân và bạn bè khi lên đây.
- Cám ơn anh và chị chủ đã giúp cho gia đình mình có những ngày ở Đà Lạt thật thoải mái và vui vẻ, chuyến du lịch trọn vẹn và nhiều ý nghĩa.

review.comment_positive: So comfortable time to stay in dalat

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
У нас был красивый номер с уютным балконом.
Было очень чисто, постельное бельё меняли каждый день.
Мы смогли арендовать хороший байк прямо в отеле.
Хозяин очень милый и приятный человек, который старался во всем нам помочь, даже не смотря на то, что не говорил на английском языке.
Идеальное соотношение цена/качество.
Пожалуй в следующий приезд в Далат вернемся именно сюда.
Могу рекомендовать этот отель.
review.comment_negative:
Напор в душе был слабоват, ближе к ночи горячая вода шла уже еле-еле.
Не хватало чайных ложек в номере.
Впечатление испортили очень громкие гости отеля в последнюю ночь, которые приехали большой группой, заселились все на наш этаж и ОЧЕНЬ громко общались, смеялись прямо в коридоре, при том что время было 5 утра.
Это конечно не вина отеля, но шумоизоляции никакой нет.

review.comment_positive:
Værelse er rent og behagelig at være her.
Vil gerne komme igen

review.comment_positive: Nuestra estancia en Da Lat ha sido genial. El alojamiento esta perfecto sobretodo teniendo en cuenta el precio, me parece que dannun servicio buenísimo. Llegamos muy pronto por la mañana y nos permitieron hacer early check-in. Nos alquilaron una moto a buen precio y aunque no hablan inglés siempre están super disponibles para ayudarte. Nos han conseguido un taxi par ir al aeropuerto muy económico y nos han limpiado la habitación y cambiado las toallas cada día. Sin duda recomendamos Vespa hotel ☺️☺️

review.rating: DONT STAY ANWHERE ELSE IN DA LAT!
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
After endleas hours looking onlne for somewhere to stay in Da Lat, we (a family of 4) decided to stay at Ves Pa Luxury Hotel and we are so glad we did. 
Hien and his lovely wife couldnt have done enough for us. From eating jackfruot seeds, hot sweet potatoes and drinling fresh coconut juice to helping us sort a local driver for the day we felt more like part of their famoly than tourists. The location is just of rhe main street but still close enough to walk to everything and nice and quiet at night. A small shop next dooe sold everything we needed and the locals were always happy to assist us anyway they could.....We arrived not knowing Hien and his wife but left as great friends. Already planning a tr
ip to stay here again next year.
review.comment_negative: There wasnt anything we didnt like.....it was all good, cant fault the location, value for money or Hien and his staff.

review.rating: Un bon hôtel où séjourner à Da Lat !

Super hôtel ! Vraiment si vous voulez un bon logement rapport qualité/prix ne cherchez pas plus loin ! 

Le propriétaire est super gentil, il nous a aidé pour trouver notre bus pour la suite du voyage, on a pu louer un scooter directement à l'hôtel, rapide et efficace ! 
Même si il ne parle pas anglais on a pu facilement échanger grâce à google translate. 

Bref rien à redire sur le séjour ici, tout est bien !
